dashboard.intro:
Welcome to Hutch!

This tour will guide you through Hutch's main features. Click the Next button below to begin.

Schedule a Breed Chain

Schedule a series of events that begins with a breed, and continues through birth and other tasks for the resulting litter.

Report a Birth

When a litter is born, report the Birth here to create the litter record and events, like weigh and butcher dates.

Record Litter Weights

Track litter performance by recording kit weights. The first time a litter is weighed, you can enter kit numbers, colors, and sex.

Report a Butcher

When it is time to butcher a litter, record the event here. The system will track butcher weights, age, and other information to judge litter performance.

Add a Task

Create a task in your schedule to track events or things to do in your rabbitry.

Sync Schedule

Sync your Hutch Schedule with external calendar apps. This allows you to get notifications and updates automatically about events on your Hutch Schedule.

Notifications

See upcoming events and tasks on your schedule.

Settings

Change system and account settings like social accounts, payment information, breed chain events, currency, weight units, and much more.

This is the end of the Tour.
Click the Done button below to return to the Hutch Dashboard.
